title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and infrastructure requirements. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Provide a high-level overview of the architecture and detailed descriptions of each component.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the data model and database schema to store climate data, simulation parameters, and simulation results. Consider the following requirements: 1) Support for storing large volumes of time-series data from various sources (weather stations, satellites, etc.). 2) Efficient querying and retrieval of data for analysis and visualization. 3) Ability to store and retrieve simulation configurations and results. 4) Scalability to handle increasing data volumes over time.

title: Climate Modeling and Simulation Engine
description: Develop the core climate modeling and simulation engine based on scientific models and algorithms.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface for configuring simulations, visualizing results, and exploring data.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, automate deployments, and implement monitoring, logging, and security best practices.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and provide support channels for users.
